metadata.title: CVE-2020-7695 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Uvicorn before 0.11.7 is vulnerable to HTTP response splitting. CRLFsequences are not escaped in the value of HTTP headers. Attackers canexploit this to add arbitrary headers to HTTP responses, or even return anarbitrary response body, whenever crafted input is used to construct HTTPheaders.

criterions.comment: python-uvicorn package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
